msbt.message: It's the store's drop-off box. Should I sell something?
Should I sell more stuff through the drop-off box?
OK So, should I sell something?
It says it's a "drop-off box." I guess I can drop off anything I want to sell.
Looks like I can't use this if my Bank of Nook account is maxed out.
Looks like I can't sell anything else this way at the moment.

How to use the drop-off boxDrop off items to sell at any time! Just place your items inside the box.Payment will be deposited into your Bank of Nook account the next day.1. Items are bought at 80% of their shop trade-in value due to handling fees.2. We cannot return any items placed inside the drop-off box.3. We can only trade turnips and give full price for hot items inside the store.
It's the drop-off box for the shop. Only folks from this island can use it.
It's some kind of drop-off box. Looks like only residents of this island can use it.
